name: Faerytaleonline - small improvements
description:
* Uses the default cursor when hovering over text, only use other types if told to do so (eg. text areas).

* Even brighter text color.

* Change the background color and add text shadow when hovering over an input area.

* Draw a border around tip pop-ups.

* Show help cursors or pointers when hovering over little blue buttons.

* Remove some margin from form elements (minor stuff)

* Fixed width of tip popups! It scales automatically now.
 change: maximum width increased

* The chat input field is now displayed at the top of the screen and the refresh button at the bottom.


latest changes:
fixed stuff for the latest char description change
made both input and refresh fields sticky
